channel.title: [pi] Ganodermic Disappears[pi]

item.title: [pi] Ganodermic Disappears[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Dylan123321 Dylan123321
item.description:
@Dylan123321 wrote:

Hello moparsacpe so after i added ganodermic everything worked out and stuff so when i log in its perfect it looks amazing but… after 2 seconds it turns into something different and when i wield it its a Christmas tree and like a giant ray of light here are the pictures heres my skype : Dylan.Avocodo

BEFORE:
Screenshot by Lightshot
2 SECONDS LATER:
Screenshot by Lightshot
WHEN WIELDED:
Screenshot by Lightshot

My ints:
case 3:
itemDef.modelID = 10919;
itemDef.name = “Ganodermic Poncho”;
itemDef.description = “It’s a Ganodermic Poncho.”.getBytes();
itemDef.modelZoom = 1513;

itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;

itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;

itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 10490;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.actions[4] = “Drop”;
break;
